meanings.definition: A coarse fabric made from horsehair or other animal hair.
meanings.sent1: The chair was upholstered in rough haircloth.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dress made of haircloth to the formal event.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the haircloth was a new type of scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The haircloth felt like a prickly blanket against his skin.
meanings.sent5: The haircloth's texture was as scratchy as a bed of thorns.

meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed his haircloth robe at the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The haircloth tunic was itchy against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The haircloth garment made him look like a medieval knight.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a warrior in her haircloth armor.
meanings.sent5: The haircloth outfit was as uncomfortable as wearing a cactus.
